text.author: Marcie Rickenbacker
text.title: Letter home, Marcie Rickenbacker, Abbot Academy, Class of 1970
text.summary: On May 30, Marcie Rickenbacker writes a letter to her Mum from Abbot Academy about school acceptances, exams, a love interest named Brendan and his academic endeavors, and other small monetary matters, and also writes about trouble she has shipping things home.
